dc:title: Peter Maurin Farm
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the progress in getting Peter Maurin farm on Staten Island up and running--building, planting, neighborly help, and summer camps for children from Harlem. Extols Christian Communism of the family on the land.
